using HTML5 canvas and JS, build a system like SHRDLU that takes in commands from the user about a blocks world and displays the blocks world on the canvas.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

the blocks world visualization should be 3D using A-Frame
